resources.string: Sample client app showing how to use the Fidesmo App. Choose the API to use:
Fidesmo App is not installed in this phone. Please install it from Google Play!
Sample activity showing how to call the Fidesmo Transceive API from a mobile client. Enter the UUID returned by the Fidesmo Transceive API in the text field below:
Download command APDUs to a contactless card
Download command APDUs to a DeviceFidelity microSD card
Please enter UUID correctly. Format: 8-4-4-4-12 hex digits, like this: 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000

Sample activity showing how to use the Fidesmo Service Delivery API, obtaining commands from a Service Provider.\nThe text field below contains the ID of the Service Provider described in the Fidesmo Service documentation\nThe Service ID is also user-editable.
Download command APDUs to a contactless card
Download command APDUs to a DeviceFidelity microSD card
Error in input parameters. Please review!
